value.description: Value of the `Input` (Used in case of controlled `Input`)
value.name: value

defaultValue.description: Adds default value to `Input` (Used in case of uncontrolled `Input`)
defaultValue.name: defaultValue

placeholder.description:
Text to display when input is empty.
Incase a label is missing, a placeholder should be provided to make it accessible for all user.
placeholder.name: placeholder

disabled.description: Disables the `Input`, making it unable to type
disabled.name: disabled

required.description: Shows the user that this field id required
required.name: required

autoComplete.description: Specifies whether `input field should have autocomplete enabled
autoComplete.name: autoComplete

readOnly.description: Disables the `Input`, making it unable to type
readOnly.name: readOnly

min.description: Valid for number it defines the most negative value in the range of permitted values.
min.name: min

max.description:
Valid for text, url, tel, email, and password, it defines the maximum number of characters
(as UTF-16 code units) the user can enter into the field.
max.name: max

minLength.description:
Valid for text, url, tel, email, and password, it defines the minimum number of characters
(as UTF-16 code units) the user can enter into the entry field.
minLength.name: minLength

maxLength.description:
Valid for text, url, tel, email, and password, it defines the maximum number of characters
(as UTF-16 code units) the user can enter into the field.
maxLength.name: maxLength

pattern.description:
The pattern attribute, when specified, is a regular expression that the input's value
must match in order for the value to pass constraint validation.
pattern.name: pattern

error.description: Shows error state in case of failed validation
error.name: error

info.description: Text to be rendered in info `Popover`
info.name: info

minWidth.description:
minimum width of `Input` component

**No default value for `type='number'`**
minWidth.name: minWidth

onClear.description: Callback function when user clicks the clear button
onClear.name: onClear

type.name: (((e: MouseEvent<HTMLElement, MouseEvent> | KeyboardEvent<HTMLElement>) => void) & ((e: MouseEvent<HTMLElement, MouseEvent>) => void)) | undefined

onChange.description:
Callback function when `Input` text changes
**Second argument will be the masked value**
onChange.name: onChange

type.name: (((e: ChangeEvent<HTMLInputElement>) => void) & ((e: ChangeEvent<HTMLInputElement>, maskedVal: string) => void)) | undefined

onClick.description: Handler to be called when `Input` is clicked
onClick.name: onClick

onBlur.description:
Handler to be called when `Input` loses focus
**Second argument will be the masked value**
onBlur.name: onBlur

type.name: (((e: FocusEvent<HTMLInputElement, Element>) => void) & ((e: ChangeEvent<HTMLInputElement>, maskedVal: string) => void)) | undefined

onFocus.description: Handler to be called when `Input` gets focus
onFocus.name: onFocus

onPaste.description: Handler to be called when paste event occur inside `Input`
onPaste.name: onPaste

type.name: (((event: ClipboardEvent<HTMLInputElement>) => void) & ((e: ClipboardEvent<HTMLInputElement>, val?: string | undefined) => void)) | undefined

actionIcon.description: Custom Icon Component to be passed to Input to replace Clear Icon in the right
actionIcon.name: actionIcon

type.name: ReactElement<IconProps, string | ((props: any) => ReactElement<any, any> | null) | (new (props: any) => Component<any, any, any>)> | undefined

data-test.description: Stores custom testing data private to the component.
data-test.name: data-test

mask.description:
Every value of Array represent either fixed char or regular expression for particular index 
Mask: (string | RegExp)[]
mask.name: mask

placeholderChar.description: Character to be used for empty value at particular index in `Mask`
placeholderChar.name: placeholderChar

clearOnEmptyBlur.description: Clear the `Input` on blur if value === defaultPlaceholderValue
clearOnEmptyBlur.name: clearOnEmptyBlur
